name: Dark Flareon

attacks.name: Rage
attacks.text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Dark Flareon.

attacks.name: Playing with Fire
attacks.text: Use this attack only if there are any Fire Energy cards attached to Dark Flareon. Flip a coin. If heads, discard 1 of those Energy cards and this attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage; if tails, this attack does 30 damage.

flavorText: A Pokémon with a hot temper that can't be controlled once it's angered. Capable of breathing flames hotter than 3000°.

strengths: Rage gets stronger as Dark Flareon takes damage
Playing with Fire can do 50 damage for 2 energy
weaknesses: Playing with Fire discards energy on heads

competitiveHistory: Dark Flareon was one of the Eeveelution options in Team Rocket. Rage made it interesting as a damaged attacker, dealing more damage as it took hits. Playing with Fire offered decent damage output but with energy discard risk.

rulings.ruling: Rage damage increases by 10 for each damage counter, not each 10 damage.
